title: Relationships
verses: Romans 12:10 (WEB) — “Be tenderly affectionate… in honor prefer one another.”
John 13:34–35 (WEB) — “Love one another… by this everyone will know you are my disciples.”
Colossians 3:12–14 (WEB) — “Put on compassion, kindness… above all, love.”
Ephesians 4:2–3 (WEB) — “With patience, bearing with one another in love.”
body: Healthy relationships blend truth and grace. Listen well, speak kindly, and keep short accounts. Practice small acts of love daily.
prayer: God of love, teach me to love like Jesus—patiently, truthfully, and generously. Help me build up others today. Amen.
